txt-cover: The capture box is cover Link Analysis, click the camera botton on the component to capture Link Analysis
txt-phone-wc-pattern: Phone number of 10 characters, composed of digits and * (wildcard), making up 10 characters. Eg. 09123456**
txt-phone-pattern: Phone number composed of 10 digits. Eg 0912345678
txt-phone-international-pattern: (International) Phone number composed of at least 10 digits. Eg 0912345678, +85212345678
txt-password-pattern: Length need 12, contain special character, also english uppercase and lowercase
txt-id-no-pattern: Fisrt character need english uppercase, and then add digital, tatal need 10 characters
txt-password-due-to-expire: Your password is due to expire after {{days}} days, please change your password
txt-password-expired: Your password has expired, please change your password
